homepage.header.caption: A new way to cultivate useful habits
homepage.header.content: People in Ukraine use an average of 500 disposable bags and 70 paper cups per year. It is as easy as bringing your own eco-bag and cup to save the lives of three dolphins or one turtle and keep the oceans clean for the next generation.
homepage.eco-news.title: Eco News
homepage.eco-news.error: Failed to load news. Please try again later.
homepage.eco-news.no-news: No news available at the moment.
homepage.subscription.caption: Receive interesting news
homepage.subscription.content: Subscribe for our newsletter and always be up to date with news and updates
homepage.subscription.validation-error: Please enter a valid email address
